At the local livestock market, he has regular buyers to whom he sells his livestock. Askar's brothers help him in the buying and selling of livestock. 

Now Askar needs to increase the number of small-horned livestock. To this end, he is asking for a loan to purchase sheep.

loans.use: to buy sheep in order to increase the count of his livestock

loans.name: Anju

texts.en: Anju is 55 years old. She is married and has one child, aged 29.  Many years ago, she established her vegetable-farming business. Working seven days a week and four hours a day, she supports her family. She has already received and successfully repaid four loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent one to buy seeds and fertilizers. In the future, Anju plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support. Over 70% of Nepal's economy is agricultural. Typically, Nepali households grow crops on small plots of terraced land. Rice (bhat), lentils (daal), and vegetables (thakari) are the staples of the Nepali diet. With a Kiva loan, BPW's borrowers are able to purchase greater amounts of seed and fertilizer. With more seeds and fertilizer, a borrower is able to grow cash crops to be sold in the local market. Such crops allow households to move beyond subsistence and provide much-needed cash income throughout the year.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Gulshirin

texts.ru: Гулширину 41 года. Она разведена и живет одна. Гулширин более 15 лет работает в частной организации бухгалтером. Она честная и трудолюбивая женщина. Ее коллеги знают ее как отличного работника и великолепного человека. Она старается улучшить условию проживания и изменить образ жизни. После развода с мужем она стала не счастливой и одинокой. Гулширин получает маленькую зарплату и ели – ели справляется с расходами. Она хочет купить холодильник, так как у нее нет холодильника и ей очень трудно в жаркое время года хранить продукты питания, особенно молочные и мясные продукты. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 600 долларов США для покупки холодильника. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Gulshirin is 41 years old. She is divorced and lives alone. For more than 15 years, Gulshirin has been working in a private organization as a bookkeeper. She is an honest and hardworking woman. Her colleagues know her as an excellent worker and a magnificent person. She is trying to improve her living conditions and to make changes in her life. After the divorce from her husband, she was unhappy and lonely. 

Gulshirin receives a small salary and more or less copes with expenses. She wants to buy a refrigerator since she does not have one, and it is very difficult for her in the hot season to keep food, especially dairy and meat products.

She is requesting a loan of USD $600 to buy a refrigerator.

loans.use: to buy a fridge for her household

loans.name: Sabaly Iii Group

texts.fr:
Les  membres du groupe SABALY III sont  des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 40 ans et ont en moyenne 4 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des familles polygames à Beniko un des villages de la commune de Binko,  préfecture de Dioila, région de Koulikoro, 2ème région administrative du mali.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de micro finance Soro yiriwaso dans le but de pouvoir mieux organiser leurs activités en début d’hivernage. Les spéculations cultivées sont entre  la culture de l’arachide, du mil, haricot  et du gombo. Elles sont à leur sixième collaboration avec l’institution.
Avec ce prêt Madjougou  la première personne à gauche des debout compte acheter les intrants, les petits équipements et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir environs 1 ha de mil, d’arachide de haricot et du gombo. Les productions sont vendues au niveau de la ville de Fana après les récoltes à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice de 120 000F CFA environs pendant cette  campagne.
texts.en:
The members of the SABALY III group are married women who are, on average, 40 years old with four children each.  Most of them live in polygamous families in Beniko, one of the villages of the commune of Binko, in the Cercle of Dioïla, Koulikoro region (second administrative region of Mali).

They have joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to better organize their farming activities at the beginning of the rainy season. They grow groundnut, millet, beans and okra and are on their sixth collaboration with the institution. 

Madjougou (first from the left in the standing row) plans to use her loan to buy farm inputs and small tools, and to cover the cost of plowing to maintain about one hectare (2.47 acres) of land on which she grows groundnut, beans and okra. 

After the harvest, Madjougou sells her crops in the town of Fana, to a customer base which consists of men and women.

She is expecting to make a profit of about 120,000 CFA francs during this growing season.

loans.use: to pay for the cost of plowing and weeding, and to buy seeds, fertilizer and herbicide.

loans.name: Parviz

texts.ru: Парвизу 18 лет. Он не женат и живет с родителями. Он успешно окончил среднюю школу и поступил в Технологический Университет Таджикистана по специальности энергетик. Его отец работает директором хлеб завода. Его мать Мохистон домохозяйка. Его отец является единственным кормильцем семьи и ему трудно справляться с расходами семьи. Парвиз должен оплатить за учебный договор, но его родители не могут поддержать его. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Parviz is 18 years old. He is unmarried and lives with his parents. He successfully graduated from high school and enrolled in the Tajikistan Technological University with a specialty in energy. 

His father is the director of a bread factory. His mother Mohiston is a homemaker. His father is the sole breadwinner for the family and it is difficult for him to cope with the expenses of the family. 

Parviz must pay tuition, but his parents are not able to support him. He is requesting a loan to pay tuition.

loans.use: to pay tuition at the university

loans.name: Bakhtiyor

texts.ru: Бахтиёр жизнерадостный и толерантный молодой человек. Ему 24 года. Он женат, но не имеет детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Бахтиёр является единственным кормильцем семьи. Он более 3 лет занимается скотоводством. Он вместе со своей семьёй живет в отдаленном регионе и поэтому ему очень удобно и легко развевать бизнес скотоводством, нежели производством или торговлей. Он научился тонкостью бизнеса от своего отца, который тоже занимался скотоводством. Бахтиёр покупает скот, откармливает несколько месяцев и потом перепродает на местном рынке. Его бизнес является не только источником дохода, но и его любимым делом. Он хочет развевать бизнес дальше и получать больше дохода. От полученного дохода он хочет улучшить условию жилья до рождения своего первого малыша. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1500 сомони для покупки скота. Он ждет вашу доброту и обещает погасить займ во время.
texts.en:
Bakhtiyor is a resilient and tolerant young man. He is 24 years old. He is married, but does not have children. His mother is a homemaker. Bakhtiyor is the sole breadwinner for the family. 

For more than three years, he has been involved in raising livestock. He and his family live in a remote area and therefore it is very convenient and easy for him to develop a livestock business, rather than production or trade. He learned the subtleties of the business from his father, who also is involved in raising livestock. 

Bakhtiyor buys livestock, fattens them up over a few months and then resells them at the local market. His business is not only a source of income, but also his labor or love. He wants to develop the business further and to get a bigger income. From the profits, he wants to improve living conditions before the birth of their first child. 

He is requesting a loan of 1,500 somoni to purchase livestock. He promises to repay the loan on time.

loans.use: to buy cattle for his business

loans.name: Sanobar

texts.ru: Санобар с ранних лет пережила много тягости жизни. После смерти отца, они остались без кормильца, так как ее мать нигде не работала. Санобар начала работать на поле с ранних лет. Санобар после замужества взяла обеспечения семьи на себя, так как здоровье ее мужа не позволяет ему работать на поле, а в сельской местности нет место работы кроме работы на поле. Санобар и ее муж воспитывают 2 детей. Она должна обеспечить своих 2 детей и больного мужа сама. Она более 4 лет занимается введением бизнеса земледелием. Она в основном выращивает овощи и зерновые культуры. Она хочет купить мебели  для своего домохозяйства и с такой целью она накопила немного денег, но эти деньги не хватают. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 300 долларов США. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: From an early age, Sanobar has lived through many of life's hardships. After the death of her father, her family was without a breadwinner, because her mother did not work anywhere. Sanobar began working in the field from a young age. After marrying, Sanobar began to take it upon herself to provide for her family, because her husband's health did not permit him to work in the field, which is the only work available in the rural area.  Sanobar and her husband are raising two children. She alone has to provide for the two children and her ailing husband. For more than 4 years, she has been engaged in the agriculture business. She mainly grows vegetables and grains. She wants to buy furniture for her household and has saved up some money to do this, but it is not enough. She has requested a loan in the amount of 300 U.S. dollars.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy furniture for her household

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en:
This is Violeta. Her previous loan was a big help not just in her business but also in the education of her children and in their household education. She is in the business of selling different beverages and she also has a variety store which has been running for three years now. She also sells frozen and processed foods. She works hard to provide for her family's everyday needs.

She would like to apply for another 30,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items for sale will result for better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help sustain her family’s daily needs and children’s education expense. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Violeta dreams that her business will continue to flourish and hopes to give her family a good future. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week. It is where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Bibifusrat

texts.ru:
Бибифусрату 20 лет. Она не замужем и живет с родителями. Бибифусрат после успешного окончания средней школы поступила в Технологический Университет Таджикистана. Она учится на 3 курсе по специальности Инженер – технолог. Бибифусрат родилась в интеллигентной семье. Ее родители, образованные люди и работают в государственных учреждениях. Ее старший брат работает в Академии наук Таджикистана, а младший учится в Китае. 
В университете Бибифусрат не отстает от своих однокурсников, среди сокурсников ее очень уважают и дорожат ее дружбой. Бибифусрат очень доброжелательная, довольно милая, спокойная и разумная девушка. Она должна оплатить за учебный договор, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Bibifusrat is 20 years old.  She is unmarried and lives with her parents. After successfully completing middle school, Bibifusrat entered the Technological University of Tajikistan. She is now in her third year, and is majoring in technological engineering. Bibifurast was born into an intelligent family. Her parents are educated people, and work for government agencies. Her older brother works for the Academy of Sciences in Tajikistan, and her younger brother is studying in China. In university, Bibifurast does not lag behind her classmates, and she is well-respected and well-liked among her classmates. Bibifurast is a very friendly, rather nice, calm and sensible girl.  She needs to pay for her tuition, but does not have the money.  She has requested a loan to pay for her tuition.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for tuition at the university

loans.name: Sayfullo

texts.ru: Сайфулло молодой, трудолюбивый и целеустремленный молодой человек. У него не было возможности после окончания средней школы поступить в университет. Его родители бедные люди. Сайфулло научился у мастера ремонтировать дома и другие объекты. Он был учеником в течение 3 лет. Вот уже 2 года, как он самостоятельно занимается предоставлением услуги мастера по ремонту дома. Он работает быстро, качественно и уступает по ценам нуждающимся людям, так как он считает, что каждый человек должен выполнять социальную миссию. Он хочет жениться на прекрасной девушке, которая нравится ему. Он не имеет денег для проведения свадебного мероприятия. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для проведения свадебного торжества. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие. Этот займ поможет ему осуществить его мечту и сделает его счастливым.
texts.en:
Sayfullo is a hardworking, and conscientious young man. He did not have the chance to go to university after graduating from high school. His parents are not wealthy people. 

Sayfullo learned from a master to repair homes and other facilities. He was a student for three years. For the past two years, he has engaged in the provision of home repair services on his own. He works quickly, efficiently, and gives price concessions to needy people, because he believes that every person has to fulfill a social mission. 

He wants to get married to a beautiful young woman who likes him. He does not have the money to put on a wedding ceremony. He is requesting a loan of 5,000 somoni to put on a wedding celebration. This loan will help him to realize his dream and to bring him happiness.

loans.use: to put on his wedding party

loans.name: Ma. Socorro

texts.en:
Ma. Socorro is married and works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from raising pigs. Ma. Socorro is borrowing PHP 29000 through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food business.

Ma. Socorro has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Emilia

texts.en:
Emilia is 44 years old and married with three children, two of whom are in school.

Emilia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more items such as snack foods, canned goods, and other groceries.

Emilia has borrowed and repaid seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 20 years and also earns an income from selling personal products.

Emilia aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items such as snack foods, canned goods, and other groceries.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa works hard to support her family. She is widowed and has a restaurant business in the Philippines.

Rosa requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional ingredients.

Rosa has been in this business for seven years now.

In the future, Rosa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients for her restaurant business

loans.name: Wilmer Alberto

texts.es:
Wilmer es un joven de 25 años de edad, es soltero y vive con sus padres. Es una persona que tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura , oficio que aprendió de sus  padres.  Se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. para prepararse junto a sus padres e ir a la parcela donde cultivan y luego se dedica a prestar sus servicios como motorista de un negocio de repuestos.

 Compra el veneno, el abono, la semilla, etc en la ciudad,  donde  para llegar tiene que abordar un bus el cual se encuentra a 5 kilómetros de su vivienda.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo,  es para comprar 500 pollos de engorde e iniciar una granja y dedicarse al comercio de esto para obtener mejores ingresos para el sustento de su familia

El Comercio de pollos  mejorara su ingreso para el sustento de su familia y podrá tener mejor solvencia para dedicarse  completamente al negocio. planea en un futuro poder ampliar mas el negocio y así obtener mas ingresos
texts.en:
Wilmer is a 25-year-old young man. He is single and lives with his parents. Wilmer has been working in agriculture for several years. He learned this trade from his mother and father. Wilmer gets up at 5 a.m. each morning to get ready to work on the land with his parents before going to another job at a business that sells spare auto parts. Wilmer buy supplies for his family's farm such as pest-control substances, fertilizers, seeds, etc. in the city. To get there he must take a bus from a stop located five kilometers away from his home.

Wilmer is requesting this loan from Fundación Campo in order to buy 500 chickens for fattening and to start his own farm. He hopes to make a living from this activity so that he can help his family with his increased earnings. Selling chickens will help to increase his profits and stabilize his finances so that he can work solely in this trade. Wilmer plans to expand his business in the future and increase his profits.

loans.use: to buy 500 chickens for fattening and to start up a farm.

loans.name: Jamuna

texts.en: Jamuna is 38 years-old. She is married and has 4 children aged 21, 19, 17 and 6.  Many years ago, she established her meat shop business.  Working 7 days a week and 5 hours a day, she supports her family. She has already received and successfully repaid 5 loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent to buy chickens for her shop. In the future, Jamuna plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support. In Nepal, the meat is always fresh. In small stalls along busy roads, open air butcher shops sell chicken, goat, and water buffalo by the kilo. The stalls are piled high with product and sales are brisk. With the help of a Kiva loan, BPW's borrowers are able to purchase additional stock at better prices. This increase in purchasing volume creates greater profit margins for the borrower.

loans.use: to buys chickens

loans.name: Anorbibi

texts.ru:
Анорбиби проживает в районе Гиссар. Ей 36 лет. Она замужем и имеет двух дочерей, которым по 8 и 6 лет. Вместе с ними живет ее мать, так как муж в данное время находится на заработках за границей. У Анорбиби только среднее образование. Она с 2003 года занимается торговым бизнесом. Анорбиби имеет торговую точку на рынке и продает там детские одежды. У нее достаточно большой опыт в продажах, она в этой области уже 10 лет. Она знает что нужно ее клиентам и всегда старается продавать хороший товар по приемлемой цене. Для продвижения бизнеса Анорбиби запрашивает кредит. Она хочет приобрести разнообразный ассортимент сезонной детской одежды. 
Анорбиби целеустремленная женщина. В будущем она планирует расширить свой бизнес и приобрести новую торговую точку.
texts.en:
Anorbibi resides in the Gissar region. She is 36 years old. She is married and has two daughters, who are eight and six. Her mother lives with them, since her husband at this time is work abroad. Anorbibi only has a high school education. 

Since 2003, she has been involved in a trade business. Anorbibi has a market stall and sells children's clothing there. She has significant experience in sales and has been in this field for ten years. She knows what her clients need and always tries to sell a good product at a reasonable price. To promote her business, Anorbibi is requesting a loan. She wants to buy a diverse range of seasonal children's clothing. 

Anorbibi is a purposeful woman. In the future, she plans to expand her business and to purchase a new retail spot.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal children's clothing with the goal of developing her business

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en:
Patricia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food business.

Patricia has been in this business for six years. Patricia earns more income from firewood retailing.

Patricia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is 55 years old and married with five children.

Rosita is in the agricultural business, farming rice and raising pigs in the Philippines. Rosita requested a PHP 27,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her farm.

Rosita has been farming rice for 12 years now, and has borrowed 22 times in the past from NWTF and, more recently, from Kiva to sustain it.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream--to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth, tiene 2 hijos y es madre soltera. Desde que era joven ha conocido las actividades y tareas del campo, gracias a las enseñanzas de sus padres y debido a eso actualmente posee cultivos de berenjena y yuca de los cuales obtiene los ingresos para llevar el sustento diario a su hogar, luego de vender los productos de la cosecha en el mercado del municipio. Elizabeth es una persona trabajadora, activa y siempre va buscando opciones que le permitan salir adelante, sobrepasando obstáculos externos como el clima que afecta sus cultivos cuando se generan inundaciones por las lluvias, con lo cual ha luchado durante 15 años; ella se esfuerza diariamente, laborando arduas y extensas jornadas desde las 6:00 de la mañana y hasta las 6:00 de la tarde, motivada siempre por sus hijos que son el motor de su vida. Es por eso que solicita el crédito, con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas (semillas, abonos, fertilizantes) para continuar con la siembra, cuidado y cosecha de sus cultivos, teniendo la posibilidad de ampliarlos y, así poder ofrecer a sus hijos un mejor bienestar y mejorar la calidad de vida de todos.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a single mother of two children. Since she was young she has been working on the land with her parents, who taught her this trade. She currently grows eggplant and yucca, which she sells in a local market in order to provide for her family. Elizabeth is a hardworking and active woman who is always seeking opportunities to help her get ahead. Over the last 15 years she has overcome many obstacles such as the climate that affect her crops when the rains cause floods. Elizabeth works long days from 6 a.m. to 6 p.m., motivated by her children who are her driving force in life. That is why she is requesting this loan.

Elizabeth hopes to invest the money in the purchase of some farming supplies (seeds, compost, fertilizers) in order to continue sowing and harvesting her crops and eventually expand her production so that she will be able to better provide for her children and offer them a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies (seeds, compost, fertilizers).

loans.name: Faizullokhon

texts.ru: Файзуллохону 44 года. Он женат и является отцом пятерых детей. Файзуллохон со своей большой семьей проживает в районе Дж.Руми. У Файзуллохон средне-специальное медицинское образование. Он проработал медбратом в течение 8 лет. А в последние годы он работает на стройке. Это очень тяжелая работа и уже здоровье ему не позволяет продолжить данную работу. Файзуллохон решил начать свой собственный бизнес, который приносил бы ему хороший доход. Он собирается заниматься куплей и продажей мелкорогатого скота. У него имеется стартовый капитал в размере 2000 TJS, высланные его сыном, который находится на заработках в России. К тому же при дворе его дома имеется сарай для содержания скота. Файзуллохон просит кредит, чтобы закупить поголовье овец. Прибыль с деятельности он планирует потратить на ремонт дома для улучшения условия проживания.
texts.en:
Faizullokhon is 44 years old. He is married and is the father of five children. Faizullokhon lives with his large family in the J. Rumy region. Faizullokhon has a specialized secondary medical education. He worked as a nurse for eight years. In recent years, he has worked in construction. This is very hard work and his health does not allow him to continue this work. 

Faizullokhon decided to start his own business that would bring him a good income. He is going to engage in the buying and selling of short-horned cattle. He has starting capital of 2,000 TJS, sent by his son who is working abroad in Russia. In support of this, in the courtyard of his home is a shed for cattle. 

Faizullokhon is asking for a loan to purchase sheep. He plans to spend profits from the operations on home repairs to improve living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase sheep in order to start his own business

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
This is Mary Grace. She previously accessed a 15,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase merchandise items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were big for her children’s education and in their personal, household, and business expenditures. Aside from her direct-selling business, she also has a computer shop for additional income.

She would like to apply for another 50,000 PHP loan for her to buy additional supplies and merchandise products like clothing, footwear, undergarments, and cosmetics needed in her business. The more items she has on display and available on hand, the better. More items to sell will result for better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her children’s education and daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Mary Grace dreams to be more successful in her business and hopes that her children will finish their studies. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional supplies and merchandise products like clothing, footwear, undergarments, and cosmetics needed in her business.

loans.name: Sally

texts.en:
Sally is 38 years old and married with five children, two of whom are in school. Sally works very hard to provide for them.

Sally runs a cellphones accessories business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks of cellphone accessories to sell.

Sally has been in this business for 10 years.

In the future Sally would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of cellphone accessories to sell

loans.name: Unión 3Ks Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “UNIÓN 3KS”  iniciará el quinto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Betty es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: confección de polleras, tienda de barrio, costura de mandiles, librería, venta de CD’s, tejido de mantas, costura de chamarras.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Betty es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una promotora de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tienda de barrio; cuenta que este negocio lo aprendió hace varios años atrás al observar la necesidad que tenía sus vecinos.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de arroz, fideo, azúcar) que adquirirá de las tiendas de la Ciudad de El Alto, por mayor, y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es divorciada  y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud.
texts.en:
The communal bank group "UNIÓN 3KS” is beginning its fifth loan cycle in Pro Mujer, as part of the Central Focus on Collpani. This group is made up of eight members and is governed by a board of directors, of which Betty is the president. The businesses this group's members run are various and include chicken sales, a general store, apron sewing, CD sales, blanket weaving, and coat sewing. The loan this group is requesting will benefit small business owners.

Betty is one member of this group. She has been involved with the Pro Mujer institution since a representative showed up at her door inviting her to join two years ago. She currently runs a general store, which she opened a few years ago after spotting the need for it in her neighborhood. With the loan Betty is requesting, she will increase her stock of merchandise, buying rice, noodles, and sugar in bulk from stores in the city El Alto. Later she will sell these products in her store. This business allows Betty to generate income for her household. She is divorced and has one son. When asked what she likes about working with Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes the focus on health.

loans.use: to buy rice, noodles, and sugar.

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
This is Merlinda, resident of Payatas, Philippines. She is married to Raul and they have children. She and her husband manage their household while operating the business. She is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Merlinda operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is a retail store that sells inexpensive items, often with a single price for all items in the store. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a Php5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php500 in sales every day.

She is requesting a Php8,000 loan to help her continue in the operation of her business. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory.

Merlinda hopes that her business will continue to grow and dreams to have other business for additional income. It is also her desire for her children to finish studying.  She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to buy grocery items, toiletries and beverages for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay tuition at the university

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy is 58 years old and married with 5 children.

Daisy works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 26,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Daisy has been in this business for 16 years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Daisy aspires to save money to expand her business and continue to send her child to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Gulzada

texts.ru: Гульзаде 29 лет, замужем. Имеет троих несовершеннолетних детей. У Гульзады среднее образование, имеет очень хорошие отзывы от своих соседей. Они отзываются о ней как о доброй и трудолюбивой женщине. Гульзада в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, с 2007 года занимается торговлей продуктов питания, начав этот бизнес с 15,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Гульзады, она смогла развить и расширить свой товар, ее деятельность приносит около 20,000 сом KGS в месяц, что служит основой для покрытия расходов на питание и бытовые нужды семьи. Доходы от бизнеса позволили Гульзаде расширить свой товарооборот. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гульзада обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку оптовых товаров для дальнейшей перепродажи, а также в целях дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Гульзада хочеть заняться животноводством, она планирует купить ягнят. Доходы от кредита Гульзада планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего бизнеса, а также в будущем хочет сделать ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Gulzada is 29 years old and married. She has three young children. Gulzada has a high school education. She gets very good reviews from her neighbors. They speak of her as a kind and hardworking woman. 

Since 2007, Gulzada as the main source of income for the family has been involved in trade of food products, starting this business with 15,000 som KGS. Through hard work, Gulzada was able to develop and expand her trade. Her activities bring about 20,000 som KGS per month, which is the basis for covering costs of food and household needs for the family. Profit from the business allowed Gulzada to expand her inventory. 

In order to further develop her business, Gulzada turned to the microfinance bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy wholesale merchandise for resale, and similarly as additional income for her family. 

Gulzada wants to start raising livestock. She plans to purchase lambs. Gulzada plans to invest income from the loan to further increase her business, and in the future wants to do home repairs.

loans.use: to buy food production for resale

loans.name: Charity

texts.en:
Charity is 53 years old and married with three children.

Charity works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 19,500 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Charity has borrowed and repaid 17 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from pig fattening.

Charity aspires to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Jonsho

texts.ru: Чоншо человек с открытым сердцем и хороший семьянин. Он проживает с женой, двумя дочерьми и матерью в городе Куляб. Ему 38 лет. Он является единственным кормильцем семьи. Он зарабатывает на жизнь предоставляя услуги мастера по ремонту домов. Это является сезонной работой и Чоншо иногда остается без заказов. Сейчас Чоншо намерен начать другой вид деятельности, который приносил бы стабильный доход. У Чоншо имеется опыт вождения и он решил предоставлять услуги такси. С этой целью он обратился за кредитом. На сумму кредита и своего сбережения он хочет купить автомашину. Продолжительность его рабочего времени будет составлять с шести утра до пяти вечера. За день он будет делать 15 рейсов по маршрутной линии города. Благодаря кредиту у Чоншо будет бизнес, приносящий стабильный доход.
texts.en:
Jonsho has an open heart and is a good family man. He lives with his wife, two daughters, and his mother in Kulyab. He is 38 years old. He is the sole breadwinner for the family. He makes a living by providing home repair services. This is seasonal work and Jonsho sometimes is left without orders. Now Jonsho intends to start another activity that will bring a steady income. 

Jonsho has driving experience and he decided to offer taxi services. To this end, he applied for a loan. With the loan and his savings, he wants to buy a car. The duration of his working hours will be from six in the morning to five in the evening. During the day, he will make 15 trips on the town's travel routes. 

Thanks to the loan, Jonsho will have his business, bringing a steady income.

loans.use: to buy a car in order to offer taxi services

loans.name: Manisha

texts.en: Manisha is 23 years-old.  She is married and has one child, aged 3. In 2011, she established her meat shop business. Working 7 days a week and 5 hours a day, she supports her family. She has already received and successfully repaid 6 loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent to buy chickens and buffalo meat. In the future, Manisha plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support. In Nepal, the meat is always fresh. In small stalls along busy roads, open air butcher shops sell chicken, goat, and water buffalo by the kilo. The stalls are piled high with product and sales are brisk. With the help of a Kiva loan, BPW's borrowers are able to purchase additional stock at better prices. This increase in purchasing volume creates greater profit margins for the borrower.

loans.use: to buy meat for her shop

loans.name: Mahmadali

texts.ru: Махмадали 32 года. Он в жизни упорный и целеустремленный человек. У него есть семья - жена, двое сыновей и одна дочь, с которыми он проживает в городе Сарбанд. Махмадали построил двухэтажный дом и на первом этаже своего дома он намерен открыть продуктовый магазин. У него имеется стартовый капитал в размере 1000 долларов США. На эту сумму он проведет ремонт в помещении магазина. А для того чтобы закупить продукты питания и холодильник для магазина, он запрашивает кредит. Махмадали считает что его бизнес будет успешным, так как он будет продавать в своем магазине большой и разнообразный ассортимент продуктов питания. Ему в новом бизнесе будет помогать жена. Кредит поможет Махмадали открыть собственный семейный прибыльный бизнес и увеличить семейный доход.
texts.en:
Mahmadali is 32 years old. In his life, he is a resistant and determined person. He has a family--a wife, two sons and a daughter--with whom he resides in the town of Sarband. 

Mahmadali built a two-story house, and on the first floor her plans to open a grocery store. He has starting capital of USD $1,000. With this sum, he will renovate the store premises. And in order to buy food products and a refrigerator for the store, he is requesting a loan. Mahmadali considers that his business will be successful because he will sell a large and varied assortment of food products. His wife will help him in the new business. 

The loan will help Mahmadali to open his own profitable, family business and to increase the family income.

loans.use: to buy food products and a refrigerator in order to open a grocery store business

loans.name: Dilbar

texts.ru: Дилбару 41 года. Она мать одиночка и воспитывает 2 детей. Ее дочери 18 лет и сыну 12 лет. Дилбар обеспечивает своих детей сама. Она более 7 лет занимается шитьём женской одежды. Она умелая портниха и знает все тонкости своего дела. Дилбар в течение 1 дня шьёт 1 платье. Она имеет своих постоянных клиентов, а также она обучает учеников. Дилбар мечтает, чтобы ее дети были образованными и интеллигентными людьми. Ее дочь в этом году окончила среднюю школу и поступила в университет. Дилбар должна оплатить за учебный договор, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Dilbar is 41 years old. She is a single mother raising two children. Her daughter is 18 and her son is 12. Dilbar is supporting her children by herself. 

For more than seven years, she has been sewing women's clothing. She is a skilled dressmaker and knows all of the intricacies of her trade. Dilbar sews one dress over the course of a day. She has regular customers, and also trains apprentices. 

Dilbar dreams that her children will become educated and intelligent people. Her daughter graduated from high school this year and enrolled in the university. 

Dilbar needs to pay tuition, but does not have the money. She is requesting a loan of USD $1,000 to pay tuition.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter’s education at the university

loans.name: Hay

texts.en:
Hay is 38 years old, married, and has three children who are still dependent and enrolled in school. She is dedicated to a farming business and to her family. She spends 6-7 hours of work in her rice paddies during the rainy season lasting from May to October. She and some of the neighbors help one another to work in their fields in order to speed up their performances at the right time. Farming is the sole source of Hay's family income. 

Hay has never borrowed any loans from local state banks or MFIs before. She decided to have her first loan from HKL because she realized that HKL is providing a lower interest rate on water loans than on its general loans. That’s why she has applied for a loan to clean out the water of her well and fix it. With the loan support, she can gain access to water again for daily consumption.

loans.use: to clean out the water of her well and fix it.

loans.name: Fatkhullo

texts.ru: Фатхулло женатый человек в возрасте 43-х лет. У него двое сыновей и одна дочь, которые еще учатся в школе. Фатхулло живет со своей семьей в городе Дангара. У него среднее образование. Он занимается скотоводством в последние 4 года. Фатхулло выращивает крупнорогатый скот для откорма и продажи. Недалеко от его дома есть хорошее место для пастбища, где Фатхулло разводит там своих коров и телят. Фатхулло трудолюбивый человек. Одновременно он еще и подзарабаывает на стройке. Сейчас ему необходимо увеличить поголовье скота. Он просит кредит для закупа молочной породы коровы с целью продвижения бизнеса.
texts.en:
Fatkhullo is a married man in his 43rd year. He has two sons and a daughter who are school students. Fatkhullo lives with his family in the town of Dangara. He has a high school education. 

He has been involved in raising animals for the last four years. Fatkhullo raises livestock for fattening and resale. Not far from his home is a good place to put cattle to pasture where Fatkhullo puts his cows and calves. 

Fatkhullo is a hardworking person. At the same time, he works part-time in construction. Now, he needs to increase the number of his livestock. He is asking for a loan to buy dairy cows to promote his business.

loans.use: to buy dairy breed cows to expand the count of his livestock

loans.name: Aileen

texts.en:
Aileen is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a nipa-making business in the Philippines (weaving palm mats used for house repair and construction). She has been in this business for 22 years. She earns more income from farming rice.

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional raw materials like bamboo, nipa leaves, etc. for her nipa-making. Aileen has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional raw materials like bamboo, nipa leaves, etc.

loans.name: Yesenia

texts.es:
Yesenia tiene 30 años de edad, es casada y tiene 4 hijos. Es una persona que tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura , oficio que aprendió de sus  padres. Se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. para prepararse para ir a la parcela, junto a su esposo donde cultivan y en la tarde se dedica a los oficios domésticos mientras sus hijos van a la escuela y su esposo trabaja cuidando una finca.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar  una vaca;  la cual esta cargada y pronto producirá leche. Con la venta de leche mejorara sus ingresos para el sustento de su familia, en un futuro desea comprar mas vacas lecheras.
texts.en:
Yesenia is thirty years old and married with four children. She has been working as a farmer for several years, and learned this trade from her parents. She gets up at 5:00 am to get ready to go with her husband to the plot of land where they grow their crops and in the afternoon she takes care of housework while her children are in school and her husband works taking care of some property.

The loan she is requesting from Fundación Campo will be to purchase a pregnant cow that will be producing milk soon. Selling milk will improve her income and help her support her family. She would like to buy more milch cows in the future.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: Yulita

texts.en:
Yulita is 43 years old and married with four children, and one of them is currently in school. Yulita works very hard to provide for them. Yulita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock like shampoo, cooking oil, noodles, laundry soap, eggs, canned goods, etc. to sell in her general store.

She has been in this business for 5 years and sells a variety of items. In the future, Yulita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock like shampoo, cooking oil, noodles, laundry soap, eggs, canned goods, etc. to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Ma. Flordeluna

texts.en:
Ma. Flordeluna is 44 years old, married, and has 2 children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.  She has a tailoring business in the Philippines and has been in this business for twenty years.

She requested a PHP 40,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy materials for her tailoring. In the future, Ma. Flordeluna would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Maricel works hard to support her family. She has a nipa-making business in the Philippines (weaving palm mats used for house repair and construction), and also earns additional income from farming rice. 

Maricel has been sustaining her business activities through her past 2 loans from NWTF. She is now borrowing PHP 5,000 through NWTF to buy additional stocks of raw materials for her nipa-making. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of raw materials for her business.

loans.name: Chico

texts.pt:
Chico tem 52 anos de idade, é casado há 25 anos tem 6 filhos que estudam. É militar e vive na casa de serviço da sua esposa, que e trabalhadora do estado.
Chico esta a construir uma casa num terreno que comprou para si e sua familia pois a casa onde estao e muito pequena.
Com o valor deste empréstimo diz que irá comprar barrotes e chapas de zinco para cobrir sua casa e passar a viver lá.
No futuro pretende comprar uma viatura para facilitar as deslocações da família e terminar a construção de sua casa.
Diz que gostaria de voltar a solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar os seus planos para isso compromete se a pagar pontualmente.
texts.en: Chico, 52 years old, has been married for 25 years and has six children, all of whom are still in school. He is a soldier and lives in government-provided housing with his wife, who is a civil servant. Chico is going to build a house on a plot of land he bought for himself and his family because the house they live in now is very small. He says he will use this loan to buy joists and sheet metal for his house so they can move in. In the future he plans to buy a vehicle to make it easier for his family to get around, and to finish the construction of his house. He says he would like to request more loans to pursue his plans, so he is committed to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy joists and sheet metal for his house.

loans.name: Macario Fonseca

texts.pt: Macário é policia há mais de 20 anos, trabalha em turnos, tem 53 anos de idade, é casado e tem 9 filhos, dos quais 3 estudam frequentando nível primário e secundário e outros já pararam de estudar. Vive em casa própria e sustenta a sua família. Com o recente empréstimo vai comprar aros de janelas, varões, portas e cimento, para dar continuidade a construção da sua casa. No futuro pretende comprar uma camioneta para o transporte de mercadorias e assim poderá obter ganhos para sua família, e também vai fazer poupanças no banco.
texts.en: Macário has been a policeman for more than 20 years. He is 53 years old and married with nine children, three of whom are still in school and the rest of whom have completed their studies. He lives in his own home and supports his family. He plans to use this loan to buy construction materials (window frames, bars, doors, and cement) to continue building his house. In the future he plans to buy a truck to transport his merchandise so he can increase his family's income and save some money in the bank.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (window frames, bars, doors, and cement) to continue building his house.

loans.name: Raulina

texts.pt:
Raulina é agricultora, casada e tem 58 anos de idade. É mãe de 5 filhos dos quais 4 são maiores de idade e apenas 1 estuda. Sustenta também 3 netos que vivem com ela.
O esposo e quem ira sustentar o credito uma vez que ele e trabalhador do ministerio da defesa nacional.
Com este empréstimo a cliente quer comprar cimento, pedra, areia e chapas de zinco para iniciar a construção de uma dependência,para poder alugar e reforçar a renda da família. Ela pretende fazer isto em fases. 
Diz que vai pagar pontualmente para voltar a solicitar outros empréstimos para realizar seu plano e garantir a sua confiança com a instituição.
texts.en: Raulina, a farmer, is 58 years old and married. She has five children, four of whom are adults and one of whom is still in school. She also supports three grandchildren, who live with her. Her husband will pay off the loan with his work for the national ministry of defense. Raulina will use this loan to buy cement, stone, sand, and sheet metal to start building an extra room to rent and supplement the family's income. She plans to do this in stages. Raulina says that she will pay off the loan on time so that she can apply for additional loans to carry out her plan and prove her reliability to the foundation.

loans.use: to buy cement, stone, sand, and sheet metal to build an extra room to rent out.

loans.name: Las Mañaneras Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS MAÑANERAS”  iniciará el quinto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Pascuala es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de condimentos, venta de papa, venta de conservas, venta de cereales, venta de refrescos, venta de verduras, venta de comida.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Pascuala es integrante, ella indica que hace cuatro ciclos que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una promotora de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de verduras; cuenta que este negocio lo aprendió hace varios años atrás al observar la amplia comercialización de este producto.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de verduras) que adquirirá de las ferias de la Ciudad de El Alto, por mayor, y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es casada  y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud.
texts.en:
The “LAS MAÑANERAS” communal bank is starting its fifth cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Collpani Regional Office. It is governed by a board of directors, and Pascuala is the president. The members' businesses are varied and include: condiments sales, potato sales, canned food sales, grain sales, pop sales, vegetable sales, and food sales.
This loan will benefit these small businesses. Pascuala says that she has been part of Pro Mujer for five loan cycles. She joined at the invitation of a promoter who visited her at home. She currently has a business selling vegetables. She tells us that she learned this business several years ago when she saw how widely this product is sold.
This loan is for an increase in working capital (the purchase of vegetables) which she will acquire in the markets of the city of El Alto, wholesale. She will then sell the produce in her sales space. This work allows her to generate an income in order to maintain her household where possible; she is married and has three children.
When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responded that she likes the health space.

loans.use: to buy vegetables.

loans.name: Angelina

texts.pt:
A Sra. Angelina de 47 anos de idade, é viúva e tem 2 filhos maiores de idade. Ela é Agricultora.
O presente empréstimo será aplicado para compra de material de construção ( cimento, ferro, blocos, barrotes e pagamento de mao-de-obra) para dar continuidade a sua casa.
A Sra. Angelina tem como esperanca melhorar as condicoes de habitação e a dieta alimentar.
texts.en: Angelina is 47 years old. She is a widow with two adult children. She is a farmer. She will use this loan to purchase construction materials (cement, iron, cinder blocks, and joists) and to pay for labor to continue construction on her house. Angelina hopes to improve her living conditions and her diet.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials (cement, iron, cinder blocks, and joists) and to pay for labor to continue construction on her house.

loans.name: Made

texts.en:
Seeing that pig feed is becoming more expensive, Made decided to continue with this loan. She currently has 7 sows and will use the loan to buy a super-quality feed for 6 months. She will also buy vitamins to maintain the health of her sows and the piglets to be born.

She expects that all piglets will be born safely, grow well and that they can be sold at a high price. Made has a dream to fix her kitchen with the profits from this venture.

loans.use: To purchase super-quality feeds and vitamins.

loans.name: Maria Julio

texts.pt: Maria é negociante há mais de 10 anos, tem uma mini mercearia no quintal da casa, trabalha mais de 10 horas diárias. É solteira e mãe de 5 filhos maiores que não estão na sua responsabilidade. Vive na casa própria, fruto do seu negocio. Com o dinheiro do recente empréstimo vai comprar amendoim, feijões e fardos de roupas usadas para revender. No futuro pretende construir algumas dependências para arrendar de modo a ter mais receitas e melhorar a sua vida. Pretende também ampliar o negócio. Vai continuar a fazer empréstimos na hluvuku-adsema para concretizar os seus planos.
texts.en: Maria has had a business for more than ten years and works more than ten hours a day in her little grocery store. She is unmarried and has five adult, economically independent children. She lives in her own home that she was able to acquire because of the income her business provides. She will use this loan to buy peanuts, beans, and used clothing to resell. In the future, Maria plans to build some extra rooms to rent out so she can increase her income and improve her life. She also hopes to expand her business. She will continue to request loans from Hluvuku-Adsema to reach her goals.

loans.use: to buy peanuts, beans, and used clothing to resell.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is a single mom of two children and lives in Puntod, Lopez Jena, Misamis Occidental. To earn a living, she owns and manages an Internet cafe, including video game entertainment, in town. She has been in this business for more than two years, earning about 8,000 PHP monthly. 

She borrowed a loan from Gata Daku MPC micro-credit in order to repair a video game machine to be used at the business. She plans to expand her business and is hopeful that she can give better living conditions to her children in the near future.

loans.use: to repair a video game machine.

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en:
This is Violeta She previously accessed an 30,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase merchandise items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help in her personal, house hold and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP for her to buy additional supplies and merchandise products like clothing, footwear, undergarments, and cosmetics needed in her business. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result for better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Violeta hopes that her business will continue to flourish and dreams that her house will be rennovated. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional merchandise such as clothing, footwear, undergarments, and cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
This is Mary Ann, 32, a resident of Malibay, Pasay City, Philippines. She is married to Crisanto, a waiter, and a mother to her children. She, together with her husband, manages their own household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Mary Ann sells different juice drinks. Most of the juices that she sells are tetra-pack. Aside from selling these, she also sells fish and ready-to-wear clothing. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of 2,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php12,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy additional stocks of different juice drinks. She will also use the money to buy more fish and ready-to-wear products.

Mary Ann hopes to be able to expand her business in the coming years and dreams that her children will finish their studies. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for different juice drinks needed in her business.

loans.name: Efrain

texts.es: Don Efraín es originario de la comarca santa Rita Teustepe, está casado y tiene 3 hijos quienes estudian en la universidad. Se dedica a cultivar maíz y trigo. Su papa le heredo unas tierras donde tienen su ganado que con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo ha ido aumentando junto con el apoyo de su familia. El vende su producción en la comarca, ya que se evita gastos de transporte al venderla afuera pues no tiene recursos suficientes. Solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos como: abono, fertilizantes y pagar mano de obra para limpiar los potreros. Este crédito será de mucha ayuda, ya que podrá realizar los trabajos de la finca y evitara vender una de sus vacas. Su expectativa es aumentar y mantener bien su ganado. Al cancelar el crédito, solicitara otro para seguir mejorando su  finca.
texts.en:
Efraín is originally from the region of Santa Rita Teustepe. He is married and has three children who attend university. He works growing corn and wheat. He inherited some land from his father where they keep their cattle, which he has acquired gradually through his hard work, much effort, and his family's support. 

He sells his products within the region, which saves him the transportation costs of selling outside, since he doesn't have enough means. 

He is requesting a loan to purchase supplies like fertilizer and to pay for labor to clean the paddocks. This loan will help him a lot, because he will be able to work on his farm and avoid having to sell one of his cows. He expects to increase and properly maintain his cattle. When he pays off this loan, he will request another in order to continue improving his farm.

loans.use: to buy supplies like fertilizer and pay for labor.

loans.name: Chona

texts.en:
As a married parent of eight children, Chona works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from general store. Chona is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to buy additional fishing materials for her fishing business.

Chona has been sustaining her business activities through her past 4 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing materials

loans.name: Marío Ernesto

texts.es:
Mario tiene 42 años de edad, vive junto a su mamá. Desde hace varios años se dedica a la agricultura. Se levanta a las 4:00 a.m.  para irse al terreno que alquila pasa todo el día trabajando y en la noche cuida una granja de gallinas. 

 Compra el abono, la semilla, el veneno,etc en la ciudad camina 6 kilómetros para llegar a la parada;  para luego subir al bus que lo lleva a la ciudad, en donde compra mas barato los insumos.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 2 bueyes, que le ayuden a arar la tierra y bajar el  producto de la parcela que posee y prestar ese mismo servicio a otros y obtener mejores ingresos. planea comprar unas vacas lecheras y poder producir leche.
texts.en:
Mario is 42 and lives with his mother. He has worked in agriculture for several years. He gets up at 4:00 am to go to his land, which he rents, and spends all day working. At night, he cares for a chicken farm.
He buys the manure, seeds, pesticides, etc in the city and walks six kilometres to get to the bus stop. He then takes the bus to the city where he is able to buy the supplies at a lower cost.
This loan, which he is requesting from Fundacion Campo, is for the purchase of two oxen, which will help him to plough the land and to increase his production. He will also be able to offer this service to others in order to increase his income. He plans to buy some dairy cows and to sell milk.

loans.use: to buy two oxen.

loans.name: Maximo Hosmar

texts.es:
Don Máximo es originario de Teustepe, Boaco. Tiene 44 años de edad casado y con dos hijos. Se dedica a la actividad agropecuaria, a la siembra de granos básicos y hortalizas tales como: Chiltoma y tomate. Empezó a trabajar con sus padres desde niño en sus tierras.
Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos: abono, fertilizantes, gasolinas y plaguicidas. Sus planes futuros es poder comprar tierra para ampliar sus áreas de siembra de granos básicos y hortalizas. Su meta próxima es sembrar en mayor cantidad  chiltoma y maíz.
texts.en:
Máximo is originally from Teustepe, Boaco. He is 44 years old and married with two children. He works as a farmer, growing basic grains and vegetables like peppers and tomatoes. He started working as a child with his parents on their land. 

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies: fertilizer, gasoline, and pesticides. His plans for the future include purchasing more land to increase the area where he grows his basic grains and vegetables. His next goal is to grow larger amounts of peppers and corn.

loans.use: to buy supplies: fertilizer, gasoline, and pesticides.

loans.name: Oneyda Liset

texts.es: Oneyda,  tiene 49 años de edad, es casada, tiene 3 hijos y vive en el municipio de Esparta, Atlántida.  Ella tiene un negocio de elaboración y venta de comidas desde hace varios años. Ofrece productos como Pastelitos rellenos de carne, Baleadas, tajadas con pollo, refrescos etc. Ella era ama de casa antes de tener su negocio. Ha decidido solicitar otro  préstamo que es el tercer ciclo y es por L. 10, 000, con el cual va comprar ropa, achinería y cosméticos para vender ahí mismo donde vende comida lo que le generara una entrada mas de dinero. Su plan es sacar adelante a su familia con mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Oneyda is 49. She is married with three children and lives in the municipality of Esparta, Atlántida. She has had a business making and selling food for several years. She offers products such as meat-filled pastries, baleada [flour tortilla folded in half, filled with refried beans, cheese, cream, and other ingredients], fried plantains with chicken, pop, etc. She was a housewife before opening her business. She has decided to request another loan, her third cycle, of 10,000 lempiras. With it, she will purchase clothing, low-cost consumer goods and cosmetics to sell in the same place where she sells food. This will start her off making more money. Her plan is to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothing, low-cost consumer goods, and cosmetics for sale.

loans.name: Stephanus

texts.en:
Stephanus proposes to study at the Academy of Maritime Nusantara (AMN) and would like to work in a large port in Indonesia. Currently he is a prospective student at AMN. He comes from the village of Kapuas Hulu, on the Kapuas river, the largest river in the island of Borneo, Indonesia. With these local conditions and circumstances of origin, he is motivated to learn and aspire to be a professional employee in a harbor. 

However, Stephanus has difficulty concerning his studies, as his parents only work as rubber farmers, whose income is just sufficient for their daily needs. At present he lives with his uncle, because in the area there is no secondary school and at the high school level he was also aided by his uncle. 

Stephanus hopes to get a loan from Kiva through the Student Loan program; he is very grateful to Kiva lenders who are willing to help him to continue his studies.

loans.use: To pay education fees for three years

loans.name: Eugenio

texts.es: El señor Eugenio sigue con la misma actividad de la venta de ropa según la temporada, cuenta que le fue bien con el  crédito que lo utilizo en la compra de de ropa como abrigos largos, el Sr. Eugenio en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de ropa de invierno, ya que está haciendo mucho frio y tiene demanda de estos productos, el Sr. Eugenio se siente feliz y agradecido por el apoyo que le brindan para crecer en su actividad.
texts.en: Eugenio is still working in the same area of seasonal clothing sales. He says that the previous loan was useful to him as he was able to buy items such as long coats. Eugenio is requesting a new loan to buy winter clothes since it is really cold where he lives right now, so there is a high demand for this product. Eugenio is happy and grateful for the support that you give him to help him grow his business.

loans.use: to buy winter clothes.

loans.name: Fabricio Ernesto

texts.es:
Fabricio cuenta con 23 años de edad, es casado y ha procreado tres hijos. Es una persona que tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura , oficio que aprendió de sus  padres. Se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. para prepararse junto a su esposa para ir al terreno donde cultivan y luego se dedica a prestar sus servicios como motorista de vehículo de carga.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar  4 parejas de cerdos e iniciar una granja y dedicarse al comercio de estos para obtener mejores ingresos para el sustento de su familia.   planea en un futuro poder compra un vehículo para dedicarse a hacer viajes a otras personas.
texts.en:
Fabricio is 23. He is married with three children. He has worked in agriculture for several years, a job he learned from his parents. He gets up at 5:00 am so that he and his wife can get ready to go work their land. He then works as a truck driver.
This loan, which he is requesting from Fundacion Campo, is for the purchase of four pairs of hogs in order to start a farm and to start selling hogs. This will allow him to obtain a greater income for his family. In the future he plans to buy a vehicle so that he can work as a driver for other people.

loans.use: to buy four pairs of hogs and start a farm.

loans.name: Fernando Gregorio

texts.es:
Fernando tiene 23 años de edad de estado civil unido tiene 1 hijos de 5 años de edad, vive con la familia en la Ciudad de ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Es Integrante de la VRC CRISTO REY, se encuentra ubicada en Recinto El Cañal, pertenece al Canton Ventanas se dedica a labores agricolas y pecuarias.

Fernando se dedican a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, fréjol galdúl. Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, fertilizantes, abonos, líquido mata monte.

Las compras de los productos las realizará en la ciudad de Ventanas cada 15 días. Con La ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los insumos.

Enfrenta desafíos cómo las plagas y enfermedades. El sueño es tener dinero para comprar una finca y seguir trabajando.

En el tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Fernando is 23 and in a civil union. He has one 5-year-old child and lives with his family in the city of Ventanas, in the Los Rios province.
He is a member of the Cristo Rey Communal Bank, located in El Cañal, belonging to the Ventanas canton. The residents work in agriculture and livestock.
Fernando is a farmer. He plants corn and gandul beans. He is requesting this loan for the purchase of supplies, fertilizer, manure, and liquid weedkiller.
He will make his purchases in the city of Ventanas every 15 days. This loan will help him to buy these supplies.
He confronts challenges such as pests and plant diseases. His dream is to have money to buy a farm and keep working.
In his free time he enjoys sports.

loans.use: to buy supplies, fertilizer, manure, and liquid weedkiller.

loans.name: Paulus

texts.en:
Paulus is currently a student who is taking the program 'nautical science', in a marine academy, namely Maritime Academy Nusantara. He comes from a small village in East Nusa Tenggara, Sallu village to be exact. Paulus is the first child of five children, his father works as an ordinary farmer, his mother is a  part-time teacher with minimal income. Given that economic conditions are not enough, Paulus has plans for college. But his father works as a farmer and his mother a teacher, and they must fund studies for the four siblings who are still in school. 

Paulus hopes that by obtaining a loan from Kiva, he can continue his studies and his dream to be a professional sailor can be realized, in order to make his mom and his sisters happy. Thanks from Paul to Kiva lenders, who can make it easy for him to achieve a better future.

loans.use: To pay education fees for three years

loans.name: Dely

texts.es: Dely tiene 57 años, vive acompañada de sus hijos en su casa propia. Dely es comerciante, se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles, siendo su casa su propio centro de trabajo, hace mas de 12 años viene desempeñándose en esta actividad en el cual ya tiene bastante experiencia, se inicio en este negocio buscando mejoras para su familia es por eso que decide ser más independiente para ofrecer a sus hijos un mejor futuro y un buen nivel de vida. Al principio tuvieron muchas dificultades por que sus ventas eran muy bajas y no rendía mucho, pero con el tiempo empezaron a surtir la bodega y comenzó a dinamizarse las ventas. Lo que espera de de su trabajo es seguir teniendo ingresos e ir progresando para mejorar su sistema de vida. Este es su primer crédito con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. El dinero solicitado de S/.2500.00 soles lo utilizará en la compra de productos comestibles tales como harina, arroz, azúcar, leche, entre otros.
texts.en:
Dely is 57. She lives with her children in her own home. She is a merchant, and sells edible products from her home. She has done this for 12 years and has a great deal of experience. She started this business in search of something better for her family. She decided to be more independent in order to offer her children a better future and a good standard of living.
In the beginning, she had many difficulties because her sales were very low and did not profit greatly. But with time, she started to stock her store and sales became more dynamic. What she hopes to obtain from her work is that she will be able to continue having an income and improving in order to better her life. This is her first loan with Kiva, and she is grateful for this support in getting ahead. She promises to pay her quotas punctually. She will use the requested 2500 soles to purchase edible products such as flour, rice, sugar, and milk.

loans.use: to buy edible products such as flour, rice, sugar, and milk.

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
Leonida is 45 years old and married with five children, two of whom are in school, Leonida works very hard to provide for them.

Leonida runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like canned goods, milk, spices, sugar, soap, etc.

Leonida has been in this business for 27 years.

In the future Leonida would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like canned goods, milk, spices, sugar, soap, etc.

loans.name: Isidora

texts.en:
This is Isidora, 62, a resident of Malibay, Pasay, Philippines. She is married to Rolando and a mother to their children. Together with her husband, she manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.
 
Isidora operates a tailoring business. She mainly offers curtains, bed sheets, blankets and other home trappings. Seasonal demands for clothing like uniforms and such are available all year round. She also does repairs and alterations. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of Php 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 12,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more raw materials like fabric, thread and other items needed in her business. 

Isidora dreams of having more customers and hopes to help her family financially. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and  also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for fabric, cloth, thread, needles and other materials needed in her business.

loans.name: Nikki

texts.en: Nikki is seventeen years old and still studying in a university, which is located in Misamis Occidental.  She depends on her parents' income for educational support.  She realized that she will have to help them, as she has sisters and brothers who also need financial support.  On weekends, she helped her mother's business to earn extra income.  In order to cover the cost of tuition fees and to buy school supplies, she borrowed a loan from Gata Daku MPC, where she recently joined.  She hopes to finish her studies and to work at a company that fits her qualifications.  She hopes to help her parents as well as herself.

loans.use: to pay for school tuition and supplies.

loans.name: Edmundus

texts.en:
Edmundus originates from a mountainous areas in the northern Middle Eastern Indonesia, NTT, precisely in the village of Sallu, Miomaffo western, eastern Indonesia. He left home alone, leaving his parents and three siblings, to study management at the harbor administration Commerce and Maritime Academy Nusantara, on the island of Java, in the city of Cilacap. The distance from his home village to the town of Cilacap is very far away. The expectation of his parents is that Edmundus will be diligent and quickly complete college. 

All efforts are made by his parents to help Edmundus; his father is as a civil servant in his city. His mother does not work, simply relying on her husband's salary to provide for the family and  they have to pay the schooling for their four children. Edmundus is deeply saddened by the situation of his parents, so he is determined to quickly complete his studies. He hopes, with loans from Kiva lenders, he can overcome these difficulties. Edmundus hopes to quickly get a job in a shipping company.

loans.use: To pay education fees for three years

loans.name: Paulina

texts.en:
This is Paulina.  She previously accessed a 25,000 PHP loan to buy additional supplies and merchandise needed in her business, such as clothing, footwear, undergarments, and cosmetics.  Her earnings were a big help in their personal and business expenditures.  She also has a computer shop on which she is currently focused.

She would like to apply for another 30,000 PHP loan to buy parts and to cover the maintenance costs of her computer shop.  Her profits will definitely help her to sustain their daily needs.  She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Paulina dreams that her business will expand.  She hopes to have a happy family that is closer to God. She meets up with her co-fellowship members every week to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis.  A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners.  The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, to build social capital, and to pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy computer parts and supplies.

loans.name: Celina

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Celina works hard to support her family.
